original_text: Which did eat the fat of their sacrifices, and drank the wine of their drink offerings? let them rise up and help you, and be your protection.
korean_text: 그들의 제물의 기름을 먹고 그들의 전제의 제물인 포도주를 마시던 자들이 일어나 너희를 돕게 하고 너희를 위해 피난처가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: Which did eat the fat of their sacrifices,
and drank the wine of their drink offerings?
let them rise up and help you,
